page.title: 03Adult activities in Oakley
page.content: If you are an adult living in Oakley there are a variety of activities to do.The youth club meets regularly each Thursday.Bingo is held on Friday evenings with many prizes to be won.Monthly,on Tuesday evenings,the W.I. meet. There is always a raffle and a competition.Usually a guest speaker is invited to attend.Recent competitions have included knitting,cooking, photography and best plant.Tea or coffee and biscuits are served by the ladies.For the elderly there is a monthly Darby and Joan club. There is also a ladies club. All these activities are held at the village hall.The village hall has a social and amenities committee which raises money to keep the hall in good condition. This money-raising includes dances,jumble-sales, bazaars and whist-drives.
